permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins must have a credentialed user and a user credential classification, be a manager of the credentialed user's organization or its broker via memberships, and the classification must be within the caller's UserCredentialClassification policy scope.
side_effects: Updates issued-on and/or expires-on on a user credential.
validation_notes: An ID argument is required. At least one of --issued-on or --expires-on must be provided. Issued-on and expires-on must use YYYY-MM-DD format when provided. If both issued_on and expires_on are present, expires_on must be greater than or equal to issued_on. A user cannot have overlapping credentials for the same classification. When both dates are set, issued_on and expires_on must not conflict with related user labor requirements.
